entry.title: R.I.P Techno

author.name: LucasoDevDotTk (Lucas Nguyen) and this repository contributors

entry.summary: Thank You for everything, you will never be forgotten. You have been my, and many others, favourite YouTuber. Thank You for posting content to the last days of your journey. R.I.P Technoblade, 1999-2022. o7 REST IN PEACE

entry.title: Storage Configuring in Proxmox VE

author.name: LucasoDevDotTk (Lucas Nguyen) and this repository contributors

entry.summary: This is a follow-up tutorial on my last post. Please make sure you have Proxmox VE installed. Log into your Proxmox server at the IP address of your server plus the port, 8006. Use the password you set earlier and the user root. The password you set should be very secure as the person who has the password has complete sudo control over the system. The browser should look something like this...

entry.title: Installing Proxmox VE

author.name: LucasoDevDotTk (Lucas Nguyen) and this repository contributors

entry.summary: Proxmox VE is a completely open-source level 1 virtualization operating system. It can run on very low-end hardware, and is, therefore, one of the best virtualization operating systems out there for beginners and for professional users who want a free lab to work with. You can install Proxmox on any system as long as it has the minimum requirements. What you need A system that meets the min...
